name: Forest Mushroom
description:
This is a 2D endless runner game for DATT2300 Project 3.

Description:

Forest Mushroom is a 2D endless runner game, with the theme of a forest treasure collection. The goal of this game is for the player to gain enough points to win. Player gets 1 point for each star collected, and needs to get more than 30 points to win.  

It is a simple game which is good to relax, you just needs to be patient to win!

  • Game rules/how to play:

Press spacebar to jump

Press escape to exit the game

Press Q when your energy bar is full and you want to redeem extra points.

Collect a star to get a point, collect a heart to increase your energy by one. 

Get more than 30 points to win the game.
